FuncDef:
The timer spf command configures a delay for SPF calculation.
The undo timer spf command restores the default configuration. The timer spf command configures a delay for SPF calculation. The undo timer spf command restores the default configuration. By default, the delay for SPF calculation is 5 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum delay for SPF calculation.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 120, in seconds. The default value is 5s.

Specifies the delay for the first SPF calculation.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 60000, in milliseconds. The default value is 50 ms.

Specifies the incremental delay between two times of SPF calculation.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 60000, in milliseconds. The default value is 200 ms.
